title: AppleTV Control
description: Add an Apple TV remote control to the touch 10. All communication is done directly via HDMI-CEC. No control system needed.

title: Audio Call Dial Pad
description: Create an in-room control application that adds a dedicated audio call dial pad to the Touch 10

title: Automatic Video Mute
description: Automatically mute video when you mute audio

title: Automatic Room Booking
description: Automatically books a room when the room being used

title: Audio Safe Guard
description: Enforce a maximum output volume on the device. Demostrates a simple macro using API statuses and commands

title: BeRightBack
description: Set a virtual bacground that says you are away, but still on audio.

title: Big Red Button
description: Quick action such as muting with a connected USB device

title: Block Outgoing Calls
description: Block certain numbers in a reject list from being called from the system.

title: Camera control with wide angle view
description: Your custom camera control page, including creating a wide angle view of two cameras and controlling both simultaneously.

title: Conditional Autoanswer with Prompt
description: Auto answer on incoming calls - but only for a select number of remote sites

title: Datadog Call Performance Monitoring
description: Vizualize and alert on the performance of your calls while they happen
tags: calling, meeting room, peripherals, performance, monitoring

title: Early OBTP
description: Show One Button To Push earlier than the default 5 minutes.

title: Energy Prices
description: Show hourly Norwegian electricity prices on home screen

title: Join 3rd Party Meeting
description: A Join Meeting Panel/Text Input lets you join 3rd party non-Webex meetings (SIP, eg MicroSoft Teams or Zoom)

title: Join Zoom with DTMF Zoom Tools
description: Join a Zoom call easily from a Webex Device

title: Language Selector
description: By default the touch 10 does not have a way for the end user to select the interface language. This macro adds this feature. Great for those multi-language environments.

title: Launch Halfwake
description: Set your system in halfwake / signage mode instantly from the home screen

title: Library - Send Webex Message
description: Send a Webex (chat) message from the video device using the Webex APIs

title: Library - Weather Forecast
description: Get global weather forecase from free Norwegian weather service

title: Library - Guido
description: Library for working the Webex Device UI

title: Global Macro Messaging
description: Library for Inter-Macro and Inter-Codec messaging

title: Multi-Content Solution
description: Compose multiple video inputs to one presentation source and send to far-end

title: Philips Hue
description: Control your lights from the video device

title: Pin Code Lock
description: Require user to enter pin code when using the video system

title: Quiet Mode
description: Make your device silent at the end of your workday

title: Remember My Volume
description: Ensure your volume setting is remembered, even after reboot.

title: Unbook Empty Room
description: If a room is booked but no one is there, unbook it.

title: Remote Monitoring Alert
description: Display OSD\Touch warning text when video snapshots (aka remote monitoring) are being captured

title: Report Issue
description: Report Issue web dialog that connects to Service Now

title: Room Capacity Alert
description: Display Alert on the device if a set capacity is exceeded - Based on people count API

title: Room Cleaning and Usage
description: Records cleaning events, shows time since last used, time since last cleaned, number of times since last cleaned, warns of capacity restrictions.

title: Room Kit Pro SX80 GPIO
description: See how to get the device to perform some actions when triggering a change on the built in GPIO. Add an one-button-to-dial button on the wall.

title: Room Metrics
description: Show the utilization and environmental metrics about the device of the day

title: Samsung Flip
description: Easily switch from Webex mode to Samsung Flip mode.

title: Settings Pro
description: The settings you never knew you always wanted.

title: Signage Carousel
description: Change between several different signage URLs at regular intervals.

title: Scheduled Actions
description: Have the endpoint device automatically perform actions, like placing a call, at a specified time and day.

title: Smart Dual Screen Presentation
description: Allows primary monitor on multiscreen systems to display preso content when not in a video call.

title: Soft Mute
description: Mute the device before you start a call

title: Speed Dials Panel
description: Always dialling the same few numbers from the meeting room. Maybe want to add calling 911 or the Pizza Place more prominent?

title: TicTacToe
description: Fun Game which allows the user to see how to update images and panels in real time with relation to user input!

title: USB Mode Version 2
description: Enable a USB passthrough solution on your non USB hardware

title: WebApps Manager
description: Let's you easily add/remove web apps from a ui on the device itself

title: Daily Reboot
description: Set a time of day you want your device to reboot

title: Web App with Cache Management
description: Monitors web apps so, upon exit, a prompt appears that asks the user to clear their cached login credentials.

title: Sennheiser Mute Sync
description: Sync the mute state on a Sennheiser TCCM ceiling microphone
